name: Another Simple Platformer
description:
Another Simple Platformer... Or is it?

This is a fun and challenging platformer game for you and your friends to play. Find all the tricks to complete the level.

Watch out for the spikes though! Remember you have to start the whole game again when you die.

How To Play:

  • Use the arrow keys to move and jump.
  • Press "E" when standing in a portal to teleport
  • Watch our for spikes!

Credits:

  • I am really bad at art so I used a Kenney's art pack. Find it here: https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack. It worked really well so try it for yourself.
  • Thanks to Andreas for playtesting.
